Address.value: AMERICAS TOWER, 1177 AVENUE OF THE AMERICAS,SUITE 5100, NEW YORK, New York, 10036, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Future FinTech Group Inc is engaged in the financial technology business. The company engages in the operation of a blockchain-based online shared shopping mall platform and also operates an incubator for application projects using blockchain technology. Future FinTech and its subsidiaries are developing blockchain technology for a variety of B2B and B2C real-life applications.
